channel.title: [SOLVED] MIDI script for USB MIDI interface with multiple ports?
channel.description:
i have a multiport USB MIDI interface and want to do some routing via Axoloti. (the interface is class compliant, and i can see how it's exporting in & out ports when connected to my linux box.)
from searching these forums, i know that such kind of devices is supported by current Axoloti. so far so good.
but what's absolutely unclear is: how do i refer to individual ports, say, in a MIDI script?
could anyone provide me with further explanations or examples?
thanks in advance.

item.title: [SOLVED] MIDI script for USB MIDI interface with multiple ports?
item.dc:creator: @chaocrator a.k.a. Vimanastaffel
item.description:
@chaocrator wrote:

i knew about MIDI scripts from forum search results, so now i learned that doing the same job with objects is better, and successfully added all missing ports by editing embedded objects.

problem solved.

Read full topic
item.source: [SOLVED] MIDI script for USB MIDI interface with multiple ports?

item.title: [SOLVED] MIDI script for USB MIDI interface with multiple ports?
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Yes , midi port is a usb midi ‘thing’ , so it’s defined in the usb protocol rather than the midi bytes.
Potentially there can be 16, but I think (?) I restricted the UI to 4.

Read full topic
item.source: [SOLVED] MIDI script for USB MIDI interface with multiple ports?

item.title: [SOLVED] MIDI script for USB MIDI interface with multiple ports?
item.dc:creator: @chaocrator a.k.a. Vimanastaffel
item.description:
@chaocrator wrote:

since i'm continuing to dig forums, here's a quote from an old topic:

How does the script objects work in Axoloti?

MidiSend3 is a function (has to be due to the brackets), thats defined in the firmware.
it takes, midi device, midi port (not channel!) , the midi status byte and the 2 data values (dependent on midi message, 0 if data 2 is not used)

is that „midi port (not channel)“ the entity i'm looking for?

Read full topic
item.source: [SOLVED] MIDI script for USB MIDI interface with multiple ports?
